name: Customizable Logo for CR
description:
⧸ Style for www.crunchyroll.com ⧸
Important If you experience any problems with the font, you can download the original for yourself with this! Also, the recommended length for your title is 14 letters. If it exceeds this limit, there is a pre-written code to help you adjust the space between the logo and the menu links.

*#F78C25 → %23F78C25
additional_info:
Change Log

  1. Update 1.0.3
    • Some major bug fixes and improvements.
  2. Patch 1.0
    • Some minor bug fixes and improvements.
  3. Test 0.9.3
    • Minor bug for Firefox users fixed.
    • Testing new technique for logo coloring.
  4. Patch 0.9.2
    • Testing new font.
    • Updated @Font-Face.
    • Added option to write your own logo.
    • Re-organized coding for easier reading.

DISCLAIMER

Just for fair warning.
  1. This style was created in google chrome, as it's my browser of choice. Whether or not this style is compatible with other browsers is a mystery to me.
  2. My overall knowledge of coding is limited — this is just a hobby I picked up recently — so most of my styles are created by trail and error.
With that all in mind, I hope you can all be patient with me, I assure you, I am doing my best!
